text: C.H. Greenblatt is a American animator who has worked on a few episodes of SpongeBob SquarePants, he created three cartoons, Chowder for Cartoon Network and Harvey Beaks for Nickelodeon. == References == == Other websites == Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:People from Plano, Texas Category:American cartoonists Category:Screenwriters from Texas
title: C. H. Greenblatt
